name: Snake Sokoban Spiral
description:
A "quick" game with 16 levels that try to showcase something unique about the game systems.

For Ludum Dare 45

Inspired by Stephen's Sausage Roll

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys to move
  • Enter to select
  • Backspace to return to level selection
  • Z to undo
  • R to restart
  • M to mute ambient audio
  • + Volume up
  • - Volume down

Resources used:

  • Daniel Linssen's m6x11
  • increpare's sfxr & rng

Thank you for taking a look!
